    • createCritter

      public static void createCritter​(String critter_class_name) throws assignment4.InvalidCritterException
      create and initialize a Critter subclass. critter_class_name must be the unqualified name of a concrete subclass of Critter, if not, an InvalidCritterException must be thrown.
      Parameters:
      critter_class_name -
      Throws:
      assignment4.InvalidCritterException

    • getInstances

      public static List<Critter> getInstances​(String critter_class_name) throws assignment4.InvalidCritterException
      Gets a list of critters of a specific type.
      Parameters:
      critter_class_name - What kind of Critter is to be listed. Unqualified class name.
      Returns:
      List of Critters.
      Throws:
      assignment4.InvalidCritterException
